servinfo.title: ABS warning light or ESP® warning light remains ON after ignition switch has turned ON for 2 – 3 sec.

condition.ptxt: ABS warning light or ESP® warning light remains ON after ignition switch has turned ON for 2 – 3 sec.

action.ptxt: Check system referring to ABS Warning Lamp Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON or ESP® Warning Lamp Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON
